remarks: Define the dual of an ordered structure, which replaces the order component of the structure with its reverse.  See ~ odubas , ~ oduleval , and ~ oduleg for its principal properties. _EDITORIAL_: likely usable to simplify many lattice proofs, as it allows for duality arguments to be formalized; for instance ~ latmass . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Jan-2015.)
statement: df-odu $p |- ODual = ( w e. _V |-> ( w sSet <. ( le ` ndx ) , `' ( le ` w ) >. ) ) $.
